alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:33PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Weber and east central Box Elder Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Corinne, or 12 miles west of Brigham City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brigham City, Perry, Willard, Bear River City, Corinne, South Willard, Pleasant View, Farr West, Honeyville, Elwood, Deweyville and Bear River. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 352 and 375. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
